ca.ualberta.ishelf.RecyclerAdapters

Class BorrowFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.ishelf.RecyclerAdapters.BorrowFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout.OnRefreshListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class BorrowFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout.OnRefreshListener
    BorrowFragment Send in either: key: "Book" - a Book object US 03.01.01 As a borrower, I want to specify a set of keywords, and search for all books that are not currently accepted or borrowed whose description contains all the keywords. needs to be able to search by genre or keyword according to user tastes US 03.02.01 As a borrower, I want search results to show each book not currently accepted or borrowed with its description, owner username, and status. screen should show a list of all currently available books to browse from This shows all the books that you can borrow, This activity loads all available dbooks from firebase
